code: protected void before() throws Throwable {     temporaryFolder.create().     Configuration config = new Configuration().     config.setString(BlobServerOptions.STORAGE_DIRECTORY, temporaryFolder.newFolder().getAbsolutePath()).     blobServer = new BlobServer(config, new VoidBlobStore()).     blobServer.start(). }
protected void after() {     temporaryFolder.delete().     try {         blobServer.close().     } catch (IOException e) {         LOG.error("Exception while shutting down blob server.", e).     } }
